name: Corrupted Heaven
description:
Corrupted Heaven is a dungeon crawler, roguelike, tactics game featuring cute but deadly pixel monsters. This game was developed at DePaul University as our senior Capstone project. 

This game features -

  • 10+ unique pixel monsters
  • 3 full dungeons
  • 4 difficulty settings(Easy,  Normal, Hard, and Lunatic)
  • 5 custom soundtracks

+ MORE

Team: 

Chris Cordoba - Producer

Daniel Yin - Programming

Andrew Oliver - Artist 

Kelsey Belle - Artist

Ryan Horner - Level Design

Zhiting Chen - Sound Design 

Ari H. Scott - Music
